name: TENDER FRAME COCOON: //rhapsody of cross-pollination
description:
Change can be scary. But there's a certain beauty in it, don't you think? Story

The Federal Monarchy of Nymphalida has declared war on the Hymenophs, labeling Lady Keeper an insurgent terrorist. The members of the COCOON program have been deployed to quell the independent hive-state, but doubts have already begun festering in some of its members...

Set after the dramatic events of episode 16 of TENDER FRAME COCOON, //rhapsody of cross-pollination is a side story focusing on Deidamia Leonte as she crash-lands on a desert planet unknown to her... alongside Adrena Placata, the leader of the Hymenoph's elite cell known as "Keeper's Keepers." What will become of the two on this strange land?

Features

Read the story. Over 12,000 words telling of a forbidden romance between warring factions.

See the art. Crisp pixel graphics in a stunning 4:3 resolution.

Feel the love. The newest chapter in the long-running TENDER FRAME franchise is here.


Content Warning

//rhapsody of cross-pollination contains scenes of:

  • Mild swearing
  • Depictions of space-time warfare
  • Conversations about death and losing loved ones, as well as depictions of anxiety attacks regarding one's mortality
  • Graphic violence, primarily depicted through stylized pixel art and text descriptions 

Please take care and read at your own discretion. You are loved, and you matter.
